inventory_system.description: Complete inventory and equipment system for character management

general_inventory.description: General purpose inventory slots that can hold any item

bag.description: Main bag slot for containers like backpacks, quivers, etc.

left_arm.description: Left arm slot for shields, weapons, or other held items

right_arm.description: Right arm slot for weapons or other held items

necklace.description: Necklace slot for amulets and neck accessories

ring.description: Ring slot for magical rings and finger accessories

container_system.description: System for tracking items inside containers

rules.no_nested_containers: Containers cannot be placed inside other containers
rules.container_capacity: Each container has a specific slot capacity defined in its item data
rules.container_restrictions: Containers can only hold items based on their 'contains' field
rules.double_click_to_open: Double-clicking a container opens a window showing its contents

spell_components.description: Can only contain items with type matching spell components

arrows.description: Can only contain arrows, bolts, and similar ammunition

pack.description: Special pack containers that unpack into a backpack with contents

item_tracking.description: How items are tracked in the inventory system

structure.item_reference: Items are referenced by their name/id from the equipment data
structure.quantity: Each inventory slot tracks quantity for stackable items
structure.container_contents: Containers have a separate 'contents' array tracking what's inside
structure.unique_ids: Each item instance gets a unique ID for tracking
